channel.title: How to get free music tracks
channel.description:
:rolleyes: This is a few [i]official[/i] ways to get free up to date music tracks.. Hot of the charts.
[b]WARNING:[/b] Following this tutorial may lead to a few nasty virus's or trojans. BUT that's the risk you take when downloading free music.
[i][u][b][u]LIMEWIRE VERSION[/u][/b][/u][/i] [b]Step 1[/b]
Go to http://sales.limewire.com/060625/Jm2BScAy2ZNcE2Utn7akARVQytn7RN7z/ Download Limewire pro editon. Then once you have downloaded it, run the setup. Go through this whole procedure and choose your various settings. Once this has been completed go to the finish button at the end of the setup, and restart your computer IF it asks you to.
[b]Step 2[/b]
Go to your desktop were you placed the limewire shortcut icon. Run it and it SHOULD then run and bring up the program. At the side menu to the left it will show a bar with "Music" "Videos" and a few more things. Select the "Music" one, then a search bar should appear.
[b]Step 3[/b]
Simply type the name of the music track or the artist in the search box. And well... just search. It should come up with a few of the user added music tracks that you searched for. Choose the one you want, right click it and hit download. This will now download once you have selected the location of the file path.
[b]Step 4[/b]
Once the download is complete, enjoy your favourite music tracks free of charge.. But remember people do attach virus's and malicious items to these music tracks sometimes. So it's good to scan them
[u][i][b]TORRENT VERSION[/b][/i][/u]
[b]Step 1[/b]
Go to http://www.utorrent.com/download.php OR http://www.bitcomet.com/doc/download.htm
And download the latest version of these torrent clients..
[b]Step 2[/b]
Once the download is complete run and install the client. Once the installation has completed. Finish the setup and go to the desktop were you placed the shortcut icon. Now run the torrent client. This will start the client. Then wait. Don't touch anything.
[b]Step 3[/b]
Go to one of the following torrent sites
[code]?Bitenova - http://www.bitenova.nl/ ?MiniNova - http://www.mininova.org/ ?MonoNova - http://monova.org/ ?Meganova - http://www.meganova.org/ ?Newtorrents - http://www.newtorrents.info/ ?Demonoid - http://www.demonoid.com/files/ ?TorrentReactor - http://www.torrentreactor.net/ ?TorrentSpy - http://www.torrentspy.com/ ?Torrentz - http://www.torrentz.com/torrents ?BushTorrent - http://bushtorrent.com/ ?BtBot - http://www.btbot.com/ ?ThePirateBay - http://thepiratebay.org/ ?Btjunkie - http://btjunkie.org/ ?Bitorrent - http://www.bittorrent.com/ ?Flextorrents - http://www.flextorrents.com/ ?Fulldls - http://www.fulldls.com/ ?Isohunt - http://isohunt.com/ ?Snarf-it - http://snarf-it.org/ ?TorrentBox - http://torrentbox.com/torrents-browse.php?news ?Torrentportal - http://torrentportal.com/ ?Torrent swicki - http://torrent-searcher-swicki.eurekster.com/ ?Downloadanime - http://www.downloadanime.org/ ?Mybittorrent - http://www.mybittorrent.com/ ?Yotoshi - http://www.yotoshi.com/ ?Torrent Valley - http://www.torrentvalley.com/ ?Fenopy - http://fenopy.com/ ?BtMonster - http://www.btmon.com/ ?Piratenova - http://www.piratenova.org/ ?Piratic - http://www.piratic.org/ ?Podtropolis - http://www.podtropolis.com/[/code]
Find a search bar and type in the name of the music track you would like. Once you have found it, click on it and find the download for that torrent. Once you have found that click the download button and save it.
[b]Step 4[/b]
Open the torrent that you downloaded. And select the program to open it with as your torrent client. Once it has opened it will come up on your client screen then highlight it by clicking on it. Next click the start button near to the top and it will start downloading.
[u]Good luck getting your free music tracks..[/u][br][size=1]Posted at: November 12, 2006, 10:53:54 AM[/size][hr]Nobody ever replied to this. -.-
CREDITS TO FLAMEED FURY 1 FOR THE TORRENT SITE LIST.

item.title: How to get free music tracks
item.dc:creator: @bigmac bigmac
item.description:
@bigmac wrote:

:rolleyes: This is a few official ways to get free up to date music tracks… Hot of the charts.

WARNING: Following this tutorial may lead to a few nasty virus’s or trojans. BUT that’s the risk you take when downloading free music.

LIMEWIRE VERSION
Step 1

Go to http://sales.limewire.com/060625/Jm2BScAy2ZNcE2Utn7akARVQytn7RN7z/ Download Limewire pro editon.
Then once you have downloaded it, run the setup. Go through this whole procedure and choose your various settings. Once this has been completed go to the finish button at the end of the setup, and restart your computer IF it asks you to.

Step 2

Go to your desktop were you placed the limewire shortcut icon. Run it and it SHOULD then run and bring up the program. At the side menu to the left it will show a bar with “Music” “Videos” and a few more things. Select the “Music” one, then a search bar should appear.

Step 3

Simply type the name of the music track or the artist in the search box. And well… just search.
It should come up with a few of the user added music tracks that you searched for.
Choose the one you want, right click it and hit download.
This will now download once you have selected the location of the file path.

Step 4

Once the download is complete, enjoy your favourite music tracks free of charge… But remember people do attach virus’s and malicious items to these music tracks sometimes. So it’s good to scan them

TORRENT VERSION

Step 1

Go to http://www.utorrent.com/download.php OR http://www.bitcomet.com/doc/download.htm

And download the latest version of these torrent clients…

Step 2

Once the download is complete run and install the client. Once the installation has completed. Finish the setup and go to the desktop were you placed the shortcut icon.
Now run the torrent client. This will start the client. Then wait. Don’t touch anything.

Step 3

Go to one of the following torrent sites

?Bitenova - http://www.bitenova.nl/ ?MiniNova - http://www.mininova.org/ ?MonoNova - http://monova.org/ ?Meganova - http://www.meganova.org/ ?Newtorrents - http://www.newtorrents.info/ ?Demonoid - http://www.demonoid.com/files/ ?TorrentReactor - http://www.torrentreactor.net/ ?TorrentSpy - http://www.torrentspy.com/ ?Torrentz - http://www.torrentz.com/torrents ?BushTorrent - http://bushtorrent.com/ ?BtBot - http://www.btbot.com/ ?ThePirateBay - http://thepiratebay.org/ ?Btjunkie - http://btjunkie.org/ ?Bitorrent - http://www.bittorrent.com/ ?Flextorrents - http://www.flextorrents.com/ ?Fulldls - http://www.fulldls.com/ ?Isohunt - http://isohunt.com/ ?Snarf-it - http://snarf-it.org/ ?TorrentBox - http://torrentbox.com/torrents-browse.php?news ?Torrentportal - http://torrentportal.com/ ?Torrent swicki - http://torrent-searcher-swicki.eurekster.com/ ?Downloadanime - http://www.downloadanime.org/ ?Mybittorrent - http://www.mybittorrent.com/ ?Yotoshi - http://www.yotoshi.com/ ?Torrent Valley - http://www.torrentvalley.com/ ?Fenopy - http://fenopy.com/ ?BtMonster - http://www.btmon.com/ ?Piratenova - http://www.piratenova.org/ ?Piratic - http://www.piratic.org/ ?Podtropolis - http://www.podtropolis.com/

Find a search bar and type in the name of the music track you would like. Once you have found it, click on it and find the download for that torrent. Once you have found that click the download button and save it.

Step 4

Open the torrent that you downloaded. And select the program to open it with as your torrent client.
Once it has opened it will come up on your client screen then highlight it by clicking on it. Next click the start button near to the top and it will start downloading.

Good luck getting your free music tracks…[br][size=1]Posted at: November 12, 2006, 10:53:54 AM[/size][hr]Nobody ever replied to this. -.-
